name: Nude Beach
description:
//Robots have landed at the local nude beach with the directive to destroy all humans

//Made in 1 night for Wowie Game Jam 4.0 

//Don't worry, i'm like 99% sure it's sfw

Controls

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Left mouse button - Shoot
